initial:
A tree is connected to a html component using method:
Konekti.tree(id, t, client='client', expand='fa fa-angle-right', shrink='fa fa-angle-down', inneroptions=null, leaf='', leafoptions=null video )
AttributeDescription
idHTML component to associate with the tree
tTree
clientClient listening to the tree selections
expandExpand icon for inner nodes
shrinkShrink icon for inner nodes
inneroptionsExtra operations for inner nodes
leafLeaf nodes icon
leafoptionsExtra operations for leaf nodes
